title: The Dark Night of the Soul
description: Edward struggles with self-doubt and loneliness, questioning whether he has what it takes to defeat the vampires. Sarah tries to reassure him, but Edward is unsure if he can trust himself or others.

sections.name: Section 1: Self-Doubt
sections.description: Edward wanders through the forest, lost in his thoughts about whether he's truly cut out to be a vampire slayer. He wonders if he's been foolish to think he can make a difference against such powerful foes.

sections.name: Section 2: Sarah's Encouragement
sections.setting: A small market tucked away between two larger buildings
sections.description: Sarah tries to lift Edward's spirits by telling him about the progress they've made so far and how much he's already accomplished. However, Edward remains unconvinced, feeling like he's not doing enough.

sections.name: Section 3: Lila's Revelation
sections.description: Lila shares her own struggles with loyalty to the vampire leader and reveals that she too has been questioning whether their cause is just. Edward begins to see a glimmer of hope, but still harbors doubts about his own abilities.
